website_summaries.verdict: A great price for an accurate blood pressure monitor that has a 2-year product replacement guarantee.
pros: Averages the past 3 readings for better accuracy
Each reading is timestamped for reference
cons: Readings can be a challenge for people who struggle with a backlit LCD
Some users complain about the subpar manual

customer_reviews.title: Large Cuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I was afraid the large cuff would not be big enough for my arm, but to my pleasant surprise, it's works great. I'm a size 2x or 22/24. I've tested my blood pressure against this and my original wrist tester and they both always read very close. Only off 1 or 2 digits. I've enjoy using this and it helps me feel like I can trust the reading.
customer_reviews.author: Smith217

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Easy to carry and seems to be accurate. I have compared it with my doctors reading twice and it was in the correct range. The cuff seems to be the perfect size for a large cuff.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase for an easy to use solo measurement
customer_reviews.text: Works as described, and is accurate when compared to a traditional manual blood pressure cuff. My wife (an RN) verified that the readings were accurate. Worth the purchase for an easy to use solo measurement. I left the batteries in it for a couple of months, without any use, and it worked just as well as when I used it last. It's well built, but I wouldn't want to drop it on pavement or tile, as it is just cheap plastic. Don't expect hospital grade equipment at this price and you'll be happy.
customer_reviews.author: PAPASTAG

customer_reviews.title: Scary false high readings - DO NOT purchase
customer_reviews.text: This BP monitor gave me very high, incorrect readings, scaring me to death. I sought medical attention. This product repeatedly gave a reading of 30-40 points above that of professional equipment! When purchasing, I read the reviews on top. If I’d read the * star ones, with many instances of false high readings (and other people with resulting ER bills), I would never have purchased this product. This company should investigate its quality control on such an important product.
customer_reviews.author: Jane D.

customer_reviews.title: As described - very happy
customer_reviews.text: This BP machine is easy to use and seems accurate. It is much quieter than my previous 20 year old machine. I'm a thin female adult and the cuff was still small enough for me. I'm mentioning this because the description states the cuff is large, but I think it is an average adult cuff.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene B

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and read, but THE NUMBERS ARE WRONG!
customer_reviews.text: I thought my unit was broken because the reading was so high. The next day, my doctor confirmed it was, indeed, accurate. I’ve been using the monitor three times a day, and have relied upon it for continued accuracy. My blood pressure has remained high, and many medication changes have been made based upon my machine’s reading. Yesterday, I had a three-hour infusion, which I almost cancelled because of my bp numbers. The nurses tested and retested, and my meter consistently was reading about 25 points HIGHER. in only 3 weeks! My ER copay is $1,000 so I’m glad I didn’t go based on this machine’s readings.
customer_reviews.author: BookReviewer14

customer_reviews.title: 40 points off
customer_reviews.text: Could be I just had a defective machine but my readings were extremely high. So I took it to my doctors office and had the nurse compare it to their blood pressure cuff. She tried multiple times and it was always 40-45 points higher than the offices machine. I had a lot of issues trying to return it online - and I'm pretty tech savvy - but once I was chatting with am Amazon rep, it was extremely quick and easy and my refund was processed shortly after I dropped the package off at the UPS store.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the function of this BP monitor. This one calculates faster than my previous unit and I like the multi light background showing you what range you are in. The air cord could be just a bit longer though. I do see why some people have said it can be hard to read. That is only because they are not at the correct angle when viewing the monitor. Seems like it is made to sit on a table top and patient in chair to give you the correct angle of view. Still very easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: pdm

customer_reviews.title: Failed in less than 7 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this via Amazon seven months ago, and after reading the inscrutable instructions and relying on my experience with these machines, I have used it most every morning since. Then it had trouble building up pressure, displaying "E" and giving up. Replacing the batteries did not help. Now it can never "get it up" and vibrates and buzzes a little before it gives up with "E". Bad purchase on my part.
customer_reviews.author: Leading Edge Boomer

customer_reviews.title: looks very nice and handy
customer_reviews.text: The monitor , looks very nice and handy, the cuff is good too. best part is that it all comes in a very nice bag. setting up was easy. but the BP measurements were not accurate. I had to return it because of this reason. I took nearly 5-6 readings, , and all were different. some showed that I have hypertension, some were normal, but still all very different. I have normal BP.
customer_reviews.author: RPSB

customer_reviews.title: Too frustrating
customer_reviews.text: You have to find a seat out your feet on the floor hold your arm at hearts height. Like the homie pokie. If I could go in the LR & pick up a side table I wouldn't need the thing. Maybe the aggravation lead to extremely high BP I'll test it at my drs. Save your money
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy highly suspect
customer_reviews.text: Monitor is not accurate. Several comparisons at doctor's office following comparisons at home, verified that it did not read accurately. It was off more than the potential margin of error. In addition, the case is so small that it is very difficult to get the monitor, cuff and tubing in and zip it. On the plus side it's a small unit, the cuff is easy to apply and use and the price low. Unfortunately with the accuracy issues, we will be going back to Omron.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskaheaven

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for the first few months. I attempted ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for the first few months. I attempted to change the batteries and the springs two of the springs that hold them in the machine broke and fell out. It worked really well until I had to change the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Crane

customer_reviews.title: True Readings
customer_reviews.text: Large cuff gives a much better reading. Be sure to measure your arm before ordering any blood pressure machine.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product, Not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: I have no faith in the readings this monitor is giving me. It is poorly made and errors out more often than it gives me readings. I have another home monitor that I have been using for about 5 years. I bought the easy home one to be sure i was getting good readings. Easy home is reading at least 30 points higher than normal, and yes...its is set to read mmHG! I will have my doctor take my BP in the office and compare it to this product's reading.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Instruction Booklet
customer_reviews.text: The instruction booklet did not explain in the set up process of the device that there was a US and European setting. I found it very confusing initially.After very through reading and internet research I finally figured it out, fixed it. Should be a little clearer.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is really easy to use. It seems to be very accurate. It is nice that it has a memory of past readings for up to 2 different people.
customer_reviews.author: Dana M Brakhane

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable readings.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this blood pressure cuff for about three weeks. I often would get different results after the recommended 3 minute waiting period. I brought it with me to the doctors office and tested it against their reading. It was different than theirs, so I did it again, then it was more in line with the doctor’s reading. The accuracy with this product has not been reliable to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large Cuff Easy@Home Digital Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor (Ranked as one of the Best)
customer_reviews.text: Totally impressed with this item. This blood pressure monitor was purchased as a gift for my mother-in-law after researching for a monitor that was considered one of the best on the market for the price. After testing it with my wife, I find the monitor to be reasonably priced, easy to use, and provided a quick blood pressure reading. Liked the colored identification with each type of blood pressure reading. I have no buyers regrets, and I'm 100% positive that my mother-in-law will like this gift. I very rarely write review, but thought this item was worth it. Also, the monitor arrived fairly quick using regular free mailing.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Fernandes

customer_reviews.title: BP Cuff
customer_reviews.text: Quality product for large cuff blood pressure readings. Has color coded settings for high numbers alert and also for irregular heartbeat. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: N. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: not very accurat
customer_reviews.text: It would be a great little unit if it was accurate. Consistently reads higher than my regular BP when compared to the fire department and my primary care monitors side by side.
customer_reviews.author: Manowar83

customer_reviews.title: Great for larger arms.
customer_reviews.text: I have large arms and this fits perfectly. Can be used to track for two people and is fairly simple to use.
customer_reviews.author: jradler9121

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped this would be a good choice, because it was a great price & seemed like it had pretty good reviews. Unfortunately, it took inacurate readings. I even took it to my doctors office, it was off by 15 to 20 points. Thats a lot, when dealing with your blood pressure. The cuff was large,for those that need i, but very awkward to use. On the plus side, it was easy to set up & easy to read. I have returned it and am waiting for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy if you Live Alone
customer_reviews.text: This cannot be managed at all if you do not have someone to put the cuff on you and make sure it is tight enough. I will return if I can. The wrist one does not work either if you have a small wrist. Tried that sometime ago. I guess I need a child's size in a wrist one. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: dennis panek

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have been loving this blood pressure monitor. So easy to use and understand. Works very well and comes with batteries its a big plus for me, so ready to use in seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: Broke within a month.
customer_reviews.text: Liked the item so much that when it broke within a month I purchased a second. When I contacted the manufacturer about the warrantee I was told to video the item malfunctioning and also take a pic of the serial number. and then send it to them. I didn't realize I should have just returned the item. I missed the return window as I was taking videos. Never figured out how to upload the clip and pic either. The second unit failed within a month as well. That one at least I have the insurance on.
customer_reviews.author: apatterson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This thing is all off. My daughter used it and hers kept saying 170 over something and she def does not have high bp. I used it and it’s around the same. Sad to say I threw the box away :(
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Meador

customer_reviews.title: Love the Consistency
customer_reviews.text: The monitor works very well, and the large cuff helps with the consistency. We had another brand that didn’t give accurate readings which we believe it was due to the cuff size and my husband needed a larger cuff. We are very happy with this product and will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Easy Read display.
customer_reviews.text: The display on this meter is very easy to read. I haven't had the meter very long so I can't speak to the durability of the meter but so far so good. Controls are very easy to use and it is easy to read through meter history. WISH I had known it didn't come with a power supply. However the instructions describe in detail what type of AC adapter to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MRR0513

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate high readings
customer_reviews.text: After taking this blood pressure monitor to my Dr. Office to ensure it's accuracy, it was discovered the readings were extremely high and did not reflect an accurate reading. It was tested several times in comparison to their manual BP test. But reported very high each time. I would not recommend this machine to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Inaccurate It's Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Absurdly high readings for two different adults, would be terrifying to older person to see results that say you're dying and in need of emergency care, either defective or just junk. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Pukky Stutzrollen

customer_reviews.title: As far as I could tell, the monitor was not functioning properly.
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the monitor to check my blood pressure seemed just fine. But succeeding attempts gave results that were way out of line. Whether this was the fault of the unit, or possibly my failure to reset it, I have no way of knowing. The directions do say to reset to zero, but don't say how to do that. In my defense, It appeared to start at zero every time we tried it. (We also checked my husband's blood pressure, and it too was way out of line.) I am going to return the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn J Harter

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and great display of results. I haven't checked the accuracy against my doctor's office BP monitor but it's showing pretty much what my normal readings are so hopefully it is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Mfozzy

customer_reviews.title: Good screen for elderly
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to read and use. Got for my elderly grandmother as they Dr asked for daily readings. There does not seem to be the most constant readings. Will take to dr office to compare
customer_reviews.author: americannomad

customer_reviews.title: Like the Color screen.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. The only concern is that it reads 5 -10 pts. higher than my old one which keeps me in the yellow or red zone at times. When I am able to go back to the doctor I will take both to calibrate ( after COV-19).
customer_reviews.author: Ebony

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!!! Completely inaccurate!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT PURCHASE!!! Completely inaccurate! I never write reviews like this, but this could actually hurt someone. My doctor wanted to put me on medication because my readings were so high, but when I tried using this one and hers side by side, it was a whopping 25 points off! It's too late to return it, but I'm here to warn future buyers.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Dangerously inaccurate. Do not use.
customer_reviews.text: We tested this brand-new unit at my doctor's office and the systolic was off by 14 points! And the results vary by as much as 20 points when doing several tests in a row. This inaccuracy could cause a user to give their provider incorrect BP data, which could result in bad, dangerous medical decisions. Do not use!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Rodes

customer_reviews.title: Erroneous High Readings
customer_reviews.text: We both got higher readings than our MD visit or past history. After trying for a few days, we purchased another company’s monitor and had the readings more in line with our usual blood pressure readings. The error 50 points or more higher than the second unit reading. Perhaps we were using it wrong ... but had no trouble with the unit we purchased locally.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Leake CMC®

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Compact, portable device with its own carrying case makes this really handy. Works great. Easy operating instructions.
customer_reviews.author: The Bull

customer_reviews.title: Worst BP Cuff inaccurate readings.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. This is the most inaccurate bp cuff ever. My doctor said she has never seen such inaccurate results and told me to throw this away.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: The best....5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. Very easy to use. It is color coded so you do not need to remember numbers. Blue - all good. Orange - Be alert. Red - 911. It can also be used with AC adepter, sold separately for 5 to 7 dollars. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Diya

customer_reviews.title: FAST & EASY
customer_reviews.text: The booklet can be a little more informative but I just started using it and it is VERY easy. The product got here so FAST and was appreciated
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: This blood pressure monitor is junk. It constantly reads high and squeezes your arm so tight you worry about permanent damage. To give you an idea of how it reads I took my pressure last night and it was 195/120. I of course freaked out went to the hospital and found out my pressure was actually 136/79. I felt an absolute fool.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Hinshaw

customer_reviews.title: Very large cuff
customer_reviews.text: The cuff is certainly large. If you have a small arm it probably wouldn't work. Display is also large.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Garsee

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Just got this a few days ago soI haven't been able to compare readings with a Dr's office yet to check for accuracy. But readings are consistent. Easy to put on and adjust the cuff. Seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Seelbach

customer_reviews.title: Great product and reliable/ easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Looked everywhere for a blood pressure monitor that didn't cost so much yet was reliable and accurate. This one was reasonable and is accurate. I like the colored screen to give you a warning additionally to the reading to get your attention if your BP is too high or low. Gives 2 patients history of readings which I like a lot. Good to be able to check back and see how a new RX is improving my blood pressure .
customer_reviews.author: D W

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate.
customer_reviews.text: It works as described. Bright it our family doc who checked against his manual reading and its about 98 percent perfect. He said it was trivial reading difference, not bad good device. He said it takes a skilled person to do it manually, and this was pretty clise.
customer_reviews.author: jjm96

customer_reviews.title: A good compact blood pressure monitor
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the purchase. The unit is about 1/3 the size of my older monitor (10 years old) and works fine. A nice feature is the results will change the background color of the screen...blue, you're okay...orange, in the caution area...and red, better-do-something-about-this! Gives general feedback by color with the actual numbers for a precise reading.
customer_reviews.author: Edward L. Griswold

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Ez to use and read. Compact. Seems accurate but haven’t had it long enough to speak to this.
customer_reviews.author: secret shopper

customer_reviews.title: Accuracy is unreliable.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a cuff that would be easy to put on and person would not need help to take own blood pressure. Readings are 10-15 points higher than unit my husband has that was calibrated with MD office. Very disappointed. Feel like I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Always Hopeful

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy and useful. Arrived on time in perfect shape. Didn't read the entire disclaimer that the power cord is not included.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Does not seem accurate. Have to take blood pressure 3 times to see which number comes up the most. Usually they are all different pressures. I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brex

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home and its very easy to use. If not 100% accurate i think it's pretty acurate - especially with the heart rate. Matches my fitbit.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Almazan

customer_reviews.title: Very Inacurate!
customer_reviews.text: Bp readings from this were very off from drs office monitor. Readings also varied very considerably from different arms.
customer_reviews.author: DPBgirl

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This machinecis great. I love that it comes with a large cuff and is very simple to use. I also Luke that the display turns colors based on the readout. If your blood pressure is too high it turns red. It turns orange, green, and blue depending upon your blood pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and read
customer_reviews.text: Had a little trouble on setup. However I reviewed the directions and that was all the help I needed. Easy to use and read. The only negative is that I can only check my BP on my left arm.
customer_reviews.author: CatchMeReading

customer_reviews.title: Easy to read
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Easy to use with large display and color to show your rating
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the product and the price!
customer_reviews.text: We have only had the product a week. However it was easy to start using and figure out right out of the box. There are also videos on Amazon reviews to help you learn all the features. The arm band fit both my husband and myself very nicely. Very happy with the product and the price!
customer_reviews.author: Tattered Fox

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use , large cuff
customer_reviews.text: this unit is excellent. Records up to 60 reading for two different users. Easy to use..
customer_reviews.author: Dj21

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Needed an easy to use accurate cuff for home and it fits the bill perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Robert R Beilke

customer_reviews.title: Love the different colors that light up to make it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Love the different colors that light up to make it easy to know if you are in the high blood pressure range. I use this about 5 or 6 times a day to check my blood pressure since I just started new medication and it has yet to ever fail me. The batteries that come with it are still running strong and it is has been over a month now with a lot of use. I have larger arms and needed the large cuff, so make sure you get the larger cuff if you are buff like me :D
customer_reviews.author: Waylon W

customer_reviews.title: Readings were off compared to my Doctors
customer_reviews.text: Took this along with my OMRON to see which one is more accurate. This one was way off in the reading
customer_reviews.author: Louis Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: The screen colors that change with stages of HTN is a fabulous feature. Calibrated at my doctor's and was accurate to an acceptable variance well within the ballpark. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: FERJOS

customer_reviews.title: Beware!! Incorrect high readings.
customer_reviews.text: This BP reader produces incorrect, abnormally high results. Like another reviewer this machine resulted in a health scare. This machine was showing way higher readings than my doctor or other at home machines. Do yourself a favor and pay a little bit more to get accurate readings with the Omron machines.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Much easier for one person to use than my previous monitor. The arm band tightens much easier, that makes it more accurate. Seems more accurate than the wrist monitor I was using.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF COLCLASER

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit, works well.
customer_reviews.text: This unit has worked quite well for me although it took a little bit to figure out that it is better, at least for me, to find a good setting on the cuff and just leave it there rather than pulling the Velcro on and off. I find that if I adjust the cuff so I can slide it on and off my arm to its proper positioning, the readings are much more repeatable. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Karpowitz

customer_reviews.title: Double check with your PCP to compare readings
customer_reviews.text: Readings are way off, just went to doctors where they took my BP and then tried this out and this one was way higher than the doctor's
customer_reviews.author: Kim L

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Numbers are huge and backlit so it's also easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Kailholz

customer_reviews.title: Pay attention to line
customer_reviews.text: Heads up works great but you MUST be sure to line the cuff up as directed!
customer_reviews.author: Nannette

customer_reviews.title: Great machine. I keep it with me all the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. I keep it with me all the time. I tried it at the doctor's office once and the results were very close to the doctor's big expensive machine! Great price too!!!
customer_reviews.author: CDawg

customer_reviews.title: My husband needs to monitor his pressure daily and this ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband needs to monitor his pressure daily and this really works well. The different color codes help to quickly identify the levels and what he needs to do.
customer_reviews.author: nancygail

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use with large easy to read numbers. Love the large cuff.
customer_reviews.author: Evette Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent device. Easy to use and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using it at least once a day and have had an excellent experience with the device. I was able to get it working in minutes and now can take my BP readings when and if needed. Would HIGHLY recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Don E.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t set the time
customer_reviews.text: Just got it yesterday, seems to work fine... BUT IT WILL NOT ALLOW ME TO SET DATE AND TIME... Follow instructions but machine just shuts off! #BUMMER
customer_reviews.author: Keona

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking
customer_reviews.text: The cuff is way too tight. Do not recommend the purchase. Also not sure about its accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: BG

customer_reviews.title: Should be easier for elders to figure out, not 30 anymore!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions on how to use ,SUCK (arm Band)! Not sure of accuracy yet.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Angiolini

customer_reviews.title: EASY!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy following instructions, just took me more than once to get the memory set up, but taking blood pressure is very quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the money
customer_reviews.text: This works well as I uses a couple times a week!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan F.

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations
customer_reviews.text: My husband is using this and is satisfied with the performance
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Monitor is very easy to set up and use. Arm cuff is large enough to fit your arm, with room to spare. Large numbers on screen make it easy to read, plus a bright lit screen. All in all this is a very good blood pressure monitor for anyone to use, and to understand.
customer_reviews.author: James McCord

customer_reviews.title: Clear instructions and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Clear instructions and easy to use. I have just received my order (which was received quickly) so I have only used a few times but so far, I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: ktby715

customer_reviews.title: No issues, good price
customer_reviews.text: Good price seems well made. Finally figured the color code out. This about the 4th one I've had and I have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amos Heath

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It is works good and the value is good also.
customer_reviews.author: Nola BrooksDelaRiva

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: did not like the cuff it felt cheap and hard to separate the velcro
customer_reviews.author: Pere

customer_reviews.title: Nice one.
customer_reviews.text: I use it three times a day. Does great job. Easy to place on arm.
customer_reviews.author: TKD

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Love that will light up depending on the measurements RED YELLOW AND GREEN
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Beatriz Valdivia-Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: You need to improve your quality control.
customer_reviews.text: The time and date do not set even when instructions are followed to the T.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin B.

customer_reviews.title: Bad BP machine
customer_reviews.text: This machine does NOT give accurate readings. Way too high. I have took it to the Drs twice to compare. Now I have to throw it out. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Renee braun

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work great. Have been using for several months now.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good worth price
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to use but takes a minute to makes sure you have it correctly on arm.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney Asebedo

customer_reviews.title: Great blood pressure monitor, deffinetely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to use blood pressure monitor. I got the one with the large cuff and I have about a 15" arm and it works great. I am using it with rechargeable Eneloop batteries and it works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Brent S.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is perfect I wanted to find something wrong but was unable to only had it for a couple of days, I thought orginally the side lights will light up but found out after reading the book only the screen light up still okay. I will rate it again later
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken within first week
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be just fine for the first few times. I used it a total of 6 times before it started having issues. I would press start, it would seem to delay and slowly begin filling with air. Then 3 seconds later an error would pop up. Replacing the batteries didn’t help it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. Very accurate and easy to use. Easy to read display. Great machine.
customer_reviews.author: Cmark

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 1 year
customer_reviews.text: The monitor worked great for the first year then started giving very inaccurate readings. Ex 161/93 when it was actually 127/81.
customer_reviews.author: Greg DiFilippo

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This is a good unit for traveling or just at home, works great
customer_reviews.author: UBME

customer_reviews.title: Works fine
customer_reviews.text: some variation in reading but I get the same thing at the doctors office. Wife insisted I purchase this after a few bouts of nausea and disorientation.
customer_reviews.author: Jim James

customer_reviews.title: Healthcare-manager
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product and the service given in getting this product to me was outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Fits large arms with ease
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions & it was quite easy to set the date & time ect. My mom has large arms & it fits with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia M.

customer_reviews.title: NICE PRODUCT and GREAT COLOR CODE IDEA.
customer_reviews.text: VERY ACCURATE AND USEFUL FOR ELDERLY. DON'T FORGET TO BUY THE ( LARGE CUFF ). I've bought it to my parents, and they can use it easily due to color codes. IF IT COMES WITH E;ELECTRIC ADAPTER WILL BE BETTER.
customer_reviews.author: J. Mattar

product_meta.title: Large Cuff Easy@Home Digital Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor (BP Monitor), 3-Color Hypertension Backlit Display and Pulse Meter-FDA Cleared for OTC, IHB Indicator, 2 User, FSA Eligible EBP-095L
feature_bullets: ✅ "Monitor your Blood Pressure with Easy At Home". Easy@Home EBP-095 Upper Arm Blood Pressure Monitor measures blood pressure along with pulse rate with the automatic easy-to-use one-botton measuring technique. ** Our Guarantee - We offer a 1 Year PRODUCT Quality Guarantee.* **

✅ Advanced Hypertension Indicator color codes the Systolic and Diastolic readings in green (normal), orange (prehypertension) and red (hypertension). Irregular Heartbeat (arrhythmia) Indicator alert the user the abnormality.
✅Design for 2 User Use. Memory recalls up to 120 measurements, 60 records per user. Intelligently averages past 3 measurements.

✅ Size adjustable large upper arm cuff can fit upper arm circumference of 22-42 cm (8.67 - 16.5 inch) with comfort. Portable and compact design make it easy to carry. The Carry Case and 4XAA Batteries are included.
✅ Has a unique desktop design for practical home, office or clinical use that makes it convenient to utilize and store. Sturdy and durable design.
